full_summary:
### Tender for Tactical Training
#### Reference Number: WS4203443400
#### Solicitation Number: WS4203443400
#### Date: 2023-09-11
#### Deadline: 2023-09-26T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Tactical Training.

#### Description and Requirment
The DND has a requirement for Tactical Training using Category 1 of the Supply Arrangement # W6399-21J415. This RFP is for holders of the Supply Arrangement # W6399-21J415 only. If other bidders are interested in submitting a proposal, they must first qualify for Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415.

#### Eligibility 
Only companies who have been pre-qualified under the above referenced Supply Arrangement will be eligible to bid on this RFQ.

#### How to Bid 
Tenders must be submitted electronically via CanadaBuys by 14:00 EDT on September 26, 2023.  Tenders received after this time will be declared non-conforming.

#### Background 
The DND has contracted the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) to act on its behalf for the procurement of Tactical Training services.

#### Delivery Region 
Ontario (except National Capital Region) 

#### Trade Agreements 
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this solicitation.

#### Notice Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:
- Name: Malko-Moore, Shamael
- Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Note: Due to technical constraints, no contact phone numbers are available. 

#### Documents Available
To obtain a copy of the RFP, please visit the contracting officials webpage on the PSPC website.

All communications associated with this RFQ must be through the PSPC Contracts Officer, as indicated above. Please note that PSPC will not extend this RFQ beyond the advertised closing time. Bidders are reminded that their Radar Equipment shall meet all federal, provincial, and local requirements.
